pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mocking Library for R // The two main functionalities of this package are creating mock objects (functions) and selectively intercepting calls to a given function that originate in some other function. It can be used with any testing framework available for R. Mock objects can be injected with either this package's own stub() function or a similar with_mocked_binding() facility present in the 'testthat' package.
